Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to limited-profit housing companies and tax exemptions
Summary: Relates to limited-profit housing companies and tax exemptions.
LawCode: Amd §33, Priv Hous Fin L; amd §§458-a & 467, RPT L; amd §11-245.4, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, the real property tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limited-profit housing companies and tax exemptions
